v.75.1.description:
A number of new features and bug fixes.
- Drain Sword from the rift is now randomized
- Fixed a bug with certain encounters incorrectly being assigned to "monster in box" encounters
- Exdeath world 2 events now sends at the correct time
- Black Chocobo Forest Event now sends at the correct time
- A number of new job settings and options for a more tailored experience have been added:
    - The ability to set traps to have key progression items
    - The ability to modify a list of jobs for which specific jobs will be in the world
    - The ability to set how many jobs will be in the world
    - The ability to set how job abilities will be randomized
    - For the above option there is an additional setting to state how many job groups will have abilities randomized for some settings
    - The ability to set magic to only be available if it will be usable by available jobs in the world
    - The ability to disable tiers of magic
    - The ability to set character names
    - "Piano Percent" -- :)
- The client has been updated to allow tracking of: events, starting abilities, starting jobs, current world
- A handful of location names have been updated
- Logic changes:
    - Kuzar can now have progression, it does require all 4 tablets to be in logic

Check README.txt for installations instructions.

*only usable magic setting isn't currently accounting for starting crystals correctly, this will be fixed next iteration. In the meantime I would suggest against using it in four job mode and know that it won't have your starting crystal magic in non-four job mode*
v.75.1.title: .75.1 Initial release

v.82.description:
#### New Features
- Trapped Chests have a new options for 'Any' items. This allows for any item in the multiworld to appear in trapped chests.
- Rift Bosses now have checks.
- Kuzar and Rift/Void regions have a setting to disable or enable progression appearing in those regions.

#### Fixes
- Logic for CornaJar now correctly accounts for available jobs or abilities.
- Logic for Hero's Song wasn't correctly accounting for world access, this has been fixed.
- Only_usable_magic wasn't correctly accounting for starting crystals, which broke it in four job mode, this has been fixed.
- Added an additional failsafe to hopefully prevent the very rare bug where fire crystal's checks were sent on game start.

#### Adjustments
- To assist with logical operations and make it harder to create impossible seeds the lower range of random job crystals and job ability groups has been adjusted up to 4
- There is now some logic to guarantee a combination of a physical based class and a magic based class early in the game to prevent certain bosses soft locking the seed
- Replaced some deprecated AP functions to assist with compatibility for future AP iterations
- apworld no longer chonky (made sure to pull out unnecessary files this time)

 
Check README.txt for installations instructions.

v.82.4.description:
###Fixes
- Implemented Silvris's fixes for plando, starting items, and item links 
- Fixed incorrect function call on Kelb - CornaJar

v.82.5.description:
###Fixes
Fix for generation issues: One tied to player slot not being correctly accounted for, one for incorrect rule type being applied to Kelb.

###Changes
Updates to the readme file for newer version of the world and AP
v.82.5.title: v.82.5

v0.63t.description:
- Fixes for events tied to Exdeath 1 and Exdeath final boss handling.
- Fixed Exdeath 1 bitflag: event should now actually trigger after Exdeath's defeat.
- Fixed Drain Sword in Rift First Tablet area: it should now actually be randomized.
- Added two new settings for abilities toggle and crystal range.
